item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi folks, I am a hardware engineer turned software developer. I started my journey as a chip designer at MediaTek for 3 years, switched to the software world, and joined Shovel Company. Currently, I am a blockchain developer at DefiDollar. I love working on complex math equations and building products on the Ethereum ecosystem. Love techno and house music, Ben Böhmer and Monolink are my favorite. Marvel Fan, Ironman is ❤️
